description: The Lifeguard:  Gordon Grant! Gordon, every guy's summer wet dream, is daydreaming over a girlie mag, when surprised by two beach buddies, Jim and John, who walk into Grant's seashore lifeguard station and catch the sex giant working up his supercharged fuck stick.  The pair soon gets it on hot 'n heavy with Grant in an explosive three way that plugs every hole available and finally splashes tanned bodies with eruptions of creamy ball juice.
title: Hayride
